title: Why Rent When You Can BUY?!?
posting_body: ["Many renters think that they don't have enough money to buy a house, when in reality if you're paying upwards of $2500 a month for rent you may be able to qualify for a mortgage and buy a home!", 'Owning a home has so many benefits, the main one being that you monthly payments would be going towards a valuable asset while gaining equity in your home.', "When you're a renter you're simply giving money to an individual or company and making them rich.", "If you're currently renting and considering purchasing a home give me a call and I can help you navigate the process of becoming a home owner.", 'Send me an email or give me a call.', 'Contact', 'Peter Anthonii Carey', 'Sales Associate at The Brokerage Miami', 'c.', 'show contact info', '<URL>', '<URL>', 'Follow me on IG @PeterAnthonii', 'Hablo Español']
